attributes.action: reject any suggestion that the motorist would be automatically liable in the event of a collision between a cyclist and a motorist.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Motorists must go through many hours of training about vehicle control, hazard perception and the rules of the road before being allowed onto a public highway unaccompanied.  A cyclist, on the other hand, does not, yet there is a suggestion before Government that the motorist would automatically be liable in the event of a collision between the two.  This would be unfair to motorists, and would cause their insurance premiums to rise, and no claims bonuses to be lost, possibly because of the stupidity or naivety of an untrained road user.
